title: 1943 War - The North Star - 4K - director Lewis Milestone - Censored in U.S.A during Cold War

sources.title: 1943 War - The North Star - 4K - director Lewis Milestone - Censored in U.S.A during Cold War
sources.description:
A Ukrainian village must suddenly contend with the German invasion of June 1941. As war descends, they are separated, forced to navigate dangerous choices and moral dilemmas under occupation.

Directed by Lewis Milestone

Main Cast:
Anne Baxter - Marina Pavlova
Dana Andrews - Kolya Simonov
Walter Huston - Dr. Pavel Grigorich Kurin
Walter Brennan - Karp
Ann Harding - Sophia Pavlova
Jane Withers - Clavdia Kurina
Farley Granger - Damian Simonov
Erich von Stroheim - Dr. von Harden
Dean Jagger - Rodion Pavlov

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/6smI4-bwBDQ

This film was condemned by HUAC as "subversive" propaganda, In 1957, it was re-edited as "Armored Attack", stripping pro-USSR content and adding anti-communist narration.


00:00 Full Movie with subtitles (and Italian & Russian dubbed audio)
01:18 Ukrainian villagers celebrate harvest as Nazi forces mobilize nearby
12:15 Dr. Kurin discovers wounded Soviet pilot Damian with intel about invasion
25:30 Marina and Kolya sabotage rail lines using Damian's guerrilla tactics
40:45 Nazis occupy the village - commandeer hospital for wounded soldiers
55:00 Partisans intercept radio codes while farmers poison Nazi food supply
1:10:15 Damian confronts SS officer von Harden over torture of child informants
1:25:30 Resistance fighters detonate ammunition depot during Nazi victory parade
1:40:00 Survivors join Soviet troops - raise flag over burning headquarters

Watch & learn about HUAC trials in the documentary: Hollywood on Trial (1976)
 https://youtu.be/7jbYed_DkD4
